page.title: 10Festivals and Customs
page.content: One of{SCARBOROUGH'S}annual events is the{International Festival}which this year started on{10th June.}An opening ceremony at the{Spa Grand Hall} introduced all the groups taking part. Folk dancers, Haarlem Flower Girls, Majorettes and Carnival Bands can be seen in various parts of the town providing colourful entertainment. Art and craft exhibitions, water ski shows, and aerobatic displays are just some of the events included within the Festival which ended with a colourful procession through the town. Every{Boxing Day}on the South Beach all the Scarborough{fishermen}and { {firemen}have a big football match against each other, while on{Shrove {Tuesday}we all get a day off school to go skipping on the Foreshore, and all the town takes part. There are also raft races in the harbour.
